question: 対談
sourceMnemonic:
A <kanji>versus</kanji> <kanji>discuss</kanji> is when you sit down with another person and have a <vocabulary>talk</vocabulary>. As you’re talking, it might evolve into a <vocabulary>discussion</vocabulary>. Or perhaps you’re there to have an <vocabulary>interview</vocabulary>.

<ja>対談</ja> is usually a formal discussion between two or more individuals, often organized a head of time, and with a specific purpose or topic in mind.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
